description: Understand the technical requirements of the project.
One team member should create a new GitHub repository for the project on their GitHub account and add other team members as collaborators.
Create a new React application locally in the folder of the cloned repository.
Create a Home Page in your React app that has navbar, sidebar and footer components.
Read technical materials and review the content for the following day.
Render your JSON data as a list.
Read technical materials and review the content for the following day.
